column1: Master of Science in Digital Media and Marketing
column5: Classical marketing theory and professional practice are challenged continuously by revolutionary digital and marketing technologies in contemporary organisational environments. The aim of this structured Master of Science in Digital Media and Marketing is to develop participants' expertise and scholarship within the rapidly evolving professional discipline of strategic digital media and marketing.The applied curriculum in this master's programme, integrates at its core, the technological instruments which have changed the professional practice of the marketing discipline fundamentally.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
